column5: Want to lounge around in a 2,000 sq ft home? We have plenty of space to share. As our guest you'll have access to your very own bedroom with a full walk-in closet and dresser, private bathroom (with a tub), game room, free street parking, and a backyard.  We do have a 3 year old Husky-Border Collie mix, so hopefully you're not allergic to dogs!
column8: Full Guest Bed In Large Townhome
